description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Bring the spirit of Halloween to your TV with Halloween 360! From comic to spooky, these Halloween images will fill your screen and help set the Halloween mood.  From haunted houses to grave yards, witches to vampires, you are sure to find images that will thrill and chill!
